headline: Goldman Sachs initiates coverage of medtech stocks Insulet and Dexcom at Buy
summary: Investing.com -- Goldman Sachs has initiated coverage of diabetes technology stocks Insulet (NASDAQ:PODD) and Dexcom (NASDAQ:DXCM) with Buy ratings, citing strong long-term growth prospects in both the insulin delivery and continuous glucose monitoring (CGM) markets.
